articles.title: South Africa to tour India for five T20Is soon after the IPL - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The series, starting June 9, will be key in a T20 World Cup year
articles.content: June 9 - 1st T20I, DelhiJune 12 - 2nd T20I, Cuttack June 14 - 3rd T20I, VisakhapatnamJune 17 - 4th T20I, RajkotJune 19 - 5th T20I, Bengaluru
